an8.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an8.1:2.1: “Mettaya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiya asevitaya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya atthanisamsa patikankha.
an8.1:2.3: Sukham supati, sukham patibujjhati, na papakam supinam passati, manussanam piyo hoti, amanussanam piyo hoti, devata rakkhanti, nassa aggi va visam va sattham va kamati, uttarim appativijjhanto brahmalokupago hoti.
an8.1:2.4: Mettaya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiya asevitaya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya ime atthanisamsa patikankhati.
